text: kya toone is par bhee gaur nahin kiya ki khuda hee ke phazal se kashtee dariya mein bahatee chalatee rahatee hai taaki (lakadee mein ye qoovat dekar) tum logon ko apanee (kudarat kee) baaz nishaaniyaan dikha de beshak us mein bhee tamaam sabr va shukr karane vaale (bandon) ke lie (kudarat khuda kee) bahut see nishaaniyaan dikha de beshak isamen bhee tamaam sabr va shukr karane vaale (bandon) ke lie (qudarate khuda kee) bahut see nishaaniyaan hain
